tutorials.title: Getting Started
tutorials.description: This is the prerequisites for customers using Free Trial and Paid tenancies, and Always Free accounts (if applicable). The title of the lab and the Contents Menu title (the title above) match for Prerequisite lab. This lab is always first.

tutorials.title: Lab 1: Configure the Autonomous Database Instance
Lab 2: Connect to the Glassfish legacy HR application
Lab 3: Load and verify the data in the Glassfish application
Lab 4: Enable Database Vault and verify the HR application
Lab 5: Identify the connections to the EMPLOYEESEARCH_PROD schema
Lab 6: Explore the Glassfish HR application functions with Database Vault enabled
Need Help?
tutorials.description: Solutions to Common Problems and Directions for Receiving Live Help
